items.title: Nigeria kidnappers kill 35 hostages even after ransom paid
items.description: They were put to death despite ransoms being paid for their release, a local official told the BBC.

items.title: Beijing floods kill 30 as China sees summer of extreme weather
items.description: President Xi Jinping called for "all-out" rescue efforts and preparation for "worst-case" scenarios.

items.title: Russia strikes prison in Ukraine, killing 17 and wounding dozens
items.description: The attack is one of many on the frontline region of Zaporizhzhia as Trump renews demands for a ceasefire.

items.title: Thailand accuses Cambodia of violating hours-old ceasefire
items.description: Cambodia says there have been "no armed clashes" between the two sides since the midnight ceasefire.

items.title: Police officer among four dead in shooting at New York City office building
items.description: Authorities say Shane Devon Tamura travelled across the country from Las Vegas to open fire inside the skyscraper.
